oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Our Job is to Find Out Who is Sabotaging Our Scientific Progress!"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Red Scare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Investigating committee members holding a newspaper regarding Sputnik while a blacklisted man representing "U.S. Educators and Scientists" is bound.
